Text:
Thankyou very much.
Im downloading it right now and i will let you know if i can patch it in ESR or not.
Well it didnt work to patch this either. I guess you must convert it to a dvd to patch it whith ESR. Anyway thankyou for upload and nice try^^

I'm sorry it didn't work. My other games are natural ISOs, so I think they'll work.
Sorry again, and good luck in you future endeavors ;D

Any change to OKAGE (DVD, ISO, whatever) may result in a crash whenever you descend into any of the game's dungeons. Save before entering Madril Sewers, the first dungeon, and if this occurs, try the binary unaltered and on CD rather than DVD. OKAGE is a blue-CD disc.

Excellent game, worth the effort. Thanks for the binary too, TBBear.

Official game manual, recently abandoned by S0ny, is available again.

https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6773631/Okage__Shadow_King_(PS2_NTSC)_Game_Manual_(PDF)
